text: Random email editor thing I just ran into. It seems like if you don't set a background color on a group/module, it adds `background-color:#` and `bgcolor="#"` to the inline styles, and I thiiiiiink `bgcolor="#"` makes the background black in some or possibly all email clients? It seems like that's what was going on. We were having black boxes showing up in a few places in some email clients. Could we change this so that leaving the background color field blank prints nothing instead of `background-color:#`?
I could be wrong about this, it was kind of hard to pin down
hmm I haven’t seen that happening before(where it was injecting the background color property despite not having one set)
Hey Ian, I can take a look. Can you DM me an example?

Would be nice if the deleted folder bug could be fixed semi-soon.
Devs I’m referring to the bug where if you copy a module to a new portal then delete the folder that contained the module, then copy another module from the same origin portal, that folder is now a ghost folder and doesn’t show in the UI but the newly copied module is in that folder with no way for us to move it out of that folder.

I think I run into this bug like 3 or four times a month.
